column5: I probably haven't been on this website in over a year. Once again, I let a girl distract me from my passion for fishing. Will I ever learn?! It's time to dust off my gear and hook into some monster northerns. Grant? Fidel? Where are you guys? Save me!
Welcome back, Billy. A quick rendition of "Man of Constant Sorry" and you're pardoned.
"WOMEN" eh
nothin to feel bad about, we all do it over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over and over again
The root of all evil...
and "soggy bottoms"

Thank the good Lord you came to your senses.....this is exactly why I am not a lesbian....stick with your own sex and avoid those dirty dirty females....wishing you many hours of flatulating the ABCs with your buds....I can make it to L  Sorry, but men who whine about women are missing their Mommy.
But if you were and whined about your partner who would you be missing?  BTW, I like my whine red with beef and white with fish and I sure do miss my mommy's omlettes.
Roy, I've been pickin' the banjar with renewed enthusiasm. Seems to be a pattern!
Welcome back!

Seems to be a pattern for sure with fishing and stringed instruments going hand in hand.  Roy may remember the fist MTG at BOQ where almost everyone was able to grab Diplips 5 string guitar and belt out a tune.  Then of course Doogle broke in with some impressive vocals.

I once had a lady try to drag me away from fishing.  I even went 8 months without wetting a line. These days I'm happily married to a woman who is completely cool with fishing anytime I can get out(although I had to offer up a foot rub or two along the way)...  Welcome back to sanity.
"Girls are clunky."  -Beaver Cleaver -
You should get out fishing with Fidel, he will put you on fish and set things straight. Grant(SNAG) is MIA, too bad.
My wife USE to let me go out to get my fix as needed but now that we have a 1 year old, this past season hasn't been so easy to convince her.

Welcome home brah.  Hope you take this opportunity to lay low from sport dating for a while..  I'll have my people call your people and we'll do a little esox luncheon..    He's just in between puters right now Erik.  Talked to him yesterday and he's already talking about piking downtown in his trousers..  He sends all his best and I'm confident we'll hear from him again soon.  He's got a lot of material so he must be just itching!
ya just got to be honest with her.It's alot easier to introduce a new girlfriend to your passion than to decide to take up fishin later in life and introduce it to an old wife.
I feel your pain!!  x 2 for me!!
Come on guys.....he needs to find a girl who will fish WITH him  Problem solved! Welcome back.
Oh what a tangled web we weave!!
"I used to fish....."  So did I Mr. Curtis, but it wasn't a women who slowed me down, shame on you.  Welcome back!
i agree lol
Heh, or he needs to find one who won't give him grief about fishing so often.  My lady knows I get cranky when I don't fish 4-6 times a week
